author: dapplion
content: Could you detail the benefits of merging this pre-emptive data structure VS just doing it latter once beacon + execution headers coexist in updates?

author: etan_status
content:
Avoids unnecessary code complexity (e.g., #3150 in the spec). 
Simplifies client logic (beacon slot is always inside `{beacon: ...}` wrapper regardless of downloaded data version).
Light client data rollout is still relatively tiny, so change should not be too disruptive.
The actual change of updating logic to deal with the `{beacon: ...}` wrapper is needed anyway (latest when the beacon + execution headers coexist) so there is no wasted work
